title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that an applicant for old-age, wife's, husband's, or child's insurance benefits who under present law does not qualify for a benefit for the first month in which he or she meets the applicable entitlement conditions shall be entitled to a prorated benefit for that month.
content: Amends title II of the Social Security Act to provide prorated old-age and survivors benefits for the first month in which individuals become eligible for such benefits.
